name: Iron Fist

abilities.name: Martial Arts
abilities.details: Performs a three-hit combo. Generates Chi on hit.

abilities.name: Chi Strike
abilities.details: Focuses chi for a powerful forward strike. Requires Chi.

abilities.name: Dragon Kick
abilities.details: Dashes forward with a powerful chi-infused kick.

ultimate.name: The Iron Fist
ultimate.effect: Charges his fist with immense chi for a devastating forward punch after a short channel.
ultimate.details: Summons the full power of the Iron Fist of K'un-Lun.

passives.name: Chi Focus
passives.details: Generates Chi (up to 100) by landing Martial Arts hits. Chi Strike consumes Chi.

teamups.effect: Chi generation rate increased when near specified allies.

lore: Danny Rand (or potentially Lin Lie in this game), the latest in a long line of warriors to wield the mystical power of the Iron Fist, gained by defeating the dragon Shou-Lao the Undying. This allows him to focus his chi to superhuman levels.
